text: palao gajog jung-e mid-eum-eul gajin han namjaga iss-eoss-euni geuneun geu ui mid-eum-eul sumgigo naui junim-eun hananim-isila malhan geos-eul iyulo sal haehalyeo haneunyo lago malhayeossdeola sillo moseneun junim-eulobuteo bunmyeonghan-yejeung-eul gajigo dangsinkke wassdoda man il geuga geojishaneun jalamyeon geuui geojis-i geuleul haehal geos-iyo geuga jinsil-eul malhago issdamyeon geuga neohuiege gyeong-gohan jaeang-i neohui wie iss-eul geos-ila sillo hananim-eun neom-eoseon jawa geojishaneun jaleul indohasiji anhnola
